Welcome

Hi! In just under a year, Samantha and Joseph will be getting married! 🎉

We are so excited to share this special day with you. Scroll down to see FAQs and early event info like the date and city.

Please let us know if you have any questions, you will get an official RSVP later.

FAQ

Can I bring kids?

⎯⎯ We're aiming for "explicit lyrics meets open bar" rather than "nursery rhymes meets apple juice." 18 and over, if you please!

Can I bring pets?

⎯⎯ Unfortunately, not. Our venue does not allow it.

Will you provide free lodging?

⎯⎯ No, we will not.

What is the dress code?

⎯⎯ Semi-formal, no white.

Can I bring a pal? (+1)

⎯⎯ If you are allowed to bring additional guests, this site will tell you when you are RSVPing later. If you did not see that, then you must attend without any guests.

Can I bring alcohol?

⎯⎯ Please don't. We will have alcohol.

Will I be able to smoke or vape?

⎯⎯ You can smoke or vape in the parking lot, but nowhere else. The parking lot is a short walk from the ceremony and reception areas.

Will the ceremony be outdoors or indoors?

⎯⎯ It will be outdoors! Although the chance is low according to weather forecasting, we are planning to have coverage just in case it rains. Bring an umbrella if you want to be sure not to get wet!

Does the wedding have a theme?

⎯⎯ No, but since it is in a garden, anything floral is encouraged!

What if I can't make it?

⎯⎯ No worries, make sure to RSVP that you can't make it, and/or let Joseph or Samantha know directly.

What time should I arrive?

⎯⎯ Please see the timeline above.

Will food and drinks be served at the reception? What kind of food?

⎯⎯ TBD

I still have questions, what is the best way to contact you?

⎯⎯ Please text Joseph or Samantha directly.
